name: Snake V Mongoose: Knights of Extinction
name_original: Snake V Mongoose: Knights of Extinction
description:
Snake V Mongoose: Knights of Extinction

Enter a revolutionary split-screen multiplayer environment to experience a pulse-bending, mind-racing PC exclusive title from the creators of FerretBall 5. Play as either the slippery, scaly Snake Army or the equally slippery yet furry Mongoose Force as you endeavor to turn the tide of this eternal conflict in your favor in a game that is half-MOBA, half-Battlefront, half-tower defense. Convince a friend to play with a second controller as the animal you less prefer! (Note: This game is not endorsed by psychiatrists as a method of conflict resolution.)
